function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of direct strategy to manage psychosocial issues related to covid-19 crisis","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards technology-driven future may lead to increased cyber security risks and vulnerabilities, especially with the collection and sharing of personal and sensitive data for remote transactions and interactions.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid fatigue leading to laissez-faire attitude and disregard for public health measures","category":"Public health
